channel.title: ✯ Enflux 718 ╽ PVM ╽ Econ ╽ Skilling ╽ PVP ╽ Stable
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XnK3swT.png[/img] [FONT=Impact][SIZE=6]2015 REBOOT![/SIZE][/FONT]
[URL=http://"http://enflux.org/Enflux_Updated.jar"][B][SIZE=4]✯ Download ✯[/SIZE][/B][/URL] [URL=http://"http://enflux.org"][B][SIZE=4]✯ Enflux.Org ✯[/SIZE][/B][/URL] [URL=http://"http://questworld.org/forum/"][B][SIZE=4]✯ Forums ✯[/SIZE][/B][/URL][/CENTER]
Enflux offers its very own achievements system which allows players to complete tasks inorder to recieve a highly sought after Mbox! Mbox's contain rares and have a even smaller chance to present you with a Ultra Rare! Some rewards included in these boxes would include, ► Custom Phats ► Custom Santas ► Custom Wings ► Death Cape ► Custom Weapons ► Regular Santas ► Regular Phats ► Shark Fists ► Hybrid Armor ► Hilts ► Godwars Armor ► And many other rare cosmetic items [SPOILER=Achievements Media][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UmKTpwG.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uGqvgIM.png[/img][/CENTER] ► Lootshare 100%!! ► Gravestones 100%!! ► Clan chat 100% ► Hatio ► Alchemy (High/Low) ► Enchanting (all levels) ► Party Demon ► Clan Citadel ► WildyWyrm ► God following system ► Organized home. (seriously) ► ADDED MORE 745+ items like Drygore ► 100% Construction ► More items to shops ► FALLING STAR STRIKES HOME ► 15+ Bosses ► Money Pouch 100% ► Dominion Weps ► Clue Scrolls/Rewards Same as RS ► Fixed Sprites! (Squeal, No-null mapdata) ► Vote4Rewards ► PvM Credits/Shop ► Fixed Squeal of Fortune ► Artisian Workshop ► New or Old Item Looks, You Decide! (::Switchitemslook) ► Makeover Mage ► Nex 100% ► Queen Black Dragon. COMPLETE 100% ► New King Black Dragon Added ► New Godwar Items Such as the Armadyl Buckler etc Have Been Added with Real Bonuses!
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ECw5LlG.png[/img][/CENTER] ► Clue Scrolls ► Zombies Minigame (Custom) ► Dominion Tower ► Fight Caves ► Barrows ► Duel Arena ► Fight Kiln ► Clan Wars ► Castle Wars ► Fight Pits ► Singularity ► Danger Hall [SPOILER=Minigames Media] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hJ4YdrC.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LG3qt3Y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fPPwM54.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MFrFUpf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ztv8rzo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NLSiIqr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6aRwUBm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FKzyDvO.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XmRDfUW.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AgITVeh.png[/img][/CENTER] Enflux offers a Wide Variety of bosses, each gives you PVM points which can be used in the either high or low level PVM shops. You can purchase things such as Drygores, chaotics, or maybe even teir 90 Armors! Some of the bosses you would fight include, ► All GodWars Bosses (Arma, Bandos, Zammy, Sara, and Nex ► King Black Dragon ► Sunfreet ► Vorago ► YK'Lagor ► Tormented Demons ► Corperal Beast ► Queen Black Dragon ► Bork ► Mole ► Kalphite Queen ► Lucien ► Avatars ► The Great Necrolord ► Wildy Wyrm ► Blink ► Daggonoths ► Glacors
We also offer a few custom bosses made by our team of developers, but you'll have to join to check those out. [SPOILER=PVM Media][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eab0Ldb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/y9iuZ44.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/24Ddt9C.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DeNrLTZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2MqvUss.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3LsKDBk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zdloTk4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JAyOKIK.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qBg31aW.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LG3qt3Y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7H7pGMf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IXxsJvG.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8iTdcVp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4vtAfbx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IOLo9is.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EYLmd39.png[/img][/CENTER] ► 15 + Bosses to train on. ► Customised starter gear and combat levels for classes(Warrior, Mage, Archer, Skiller). ► Dominion Tower (with Dominion factor and rewards.) ► Working slayer with rewards. ► Multiple Training Teleports. ► PvM Points, rewards for killing Monsters. ► Working LootShare. ► Custom Slayer point shop
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ueA7lRk.png[/img][/CENTER] While enflux is a heavy PVM/PVP server, Skilling is very competative. Highscores keep our community in competition with each other, and with 25 prestiges there is a lot of skilling to do! skillers can enjoy many perks of being one. There are 200m Special "Skill Master Capes" all with their own unique particle effects. Each skill has its respective outfit to increase XP boost by up to 5%. If your feeling risky, you can even skill in the wild to earn a 1.4x EXP boost!
► Stable, customised XP rate. (Not easy, not very hard). ► Construction, Own a House, build inside it and chill with friends. ► Livid Farming + Fully working Original farming with Compost bin etc. ► New Animation options for Cooking, Mining, Smithing and Fletching. ► Custom Dungeoneering, 2 Levels done. ► Agility Tickets and rewards shop. ► Agility Reward points shop ► NEW Alching (Low/high) ► NEW Enchanting ► NEW Cooking being worked on, water, flour, pies etc. ► PuroPuro ► Runespan [SPOILER=Skilling Media] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2vXzno5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4cF8H2J.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/o5tSSbU.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OIAHgHM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/g3W05DK.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XLAH3ld.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fpulUZH.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GCm4eZZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mM7WkfE.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8DpPrd8.png[/img][/CENTER] ► Mage Bank ► Revenants ► Edgeville ► East & West ► Red, White, and Purple Portals ► Dangerous Wild!
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VoY8hh8.png[/img][/CENTER] ► Polypore ► Kuradal ► Jadinko Lair ► Slayer Tower ► Glacors ► Strykwyrms ► Kuradel's Slayer Dungeon ► Fremminik Slayer Dungeon ► Taverley Slayer Dungeon ► Temple of Light ► Smoke dungeon [SPOILER=Slayer Media][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kWZeiTO.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HxV820Q.png[/img][/SPOILER]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VtlOMgz.png[/img][/CENTER] ► 745+ Items (Kalphite Armour + Drygore weapons) ► Crashing stars at home, collect stardust to purchase rewards. ► Auto-Donation System ► Highscores ► Switchitemslook (New/Old). ► Great Economy. ► Decanting. ► Money Pouch. ► Max Cape + Completionist Capes. ► Unique Home (soon to add ::sethome when player count rises). ► Dwarf Multi-cannons. ► Custom Punishment system, warnings (BlackMarks) with automatic punishments such as jail/ban. ► Party Demon summoned to rock out the home. ► Now much more dialogue, more objects at home, skill flags etc. ► 100% working Loyalty Shop ► 200M "Mastery" capes for all 25 Working Skills ► Updated Daily ► Flawless Switching ► Very Qualified Staff ► Custom Forums ► 50x EXP Rate ► Teir 90 Armor and Weapons ► Obsidian, tetsu, sea singer and death lotus ► melee/ranged/mage kiln capes ► Dwarf Multi-cannon ► PVM and PVP Shops [SPOILER=Extra Media][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rkFyYzD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/na3STtN.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4RDBhv8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UP8KJdT.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/803f780.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UYf1ua9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/huRFLCL.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3gXB9so.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UT3t3V6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7dMDaZ1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NAYuG9V.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/z2RiHhc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zVutahl.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[CENTER][U][FONT=Impact][SIZE=3]Owner[/SIZE][/FONT][/U] Nicholas
[U][FONT=Impact][SIZE=3]Admins[/SIZE][/FONT][/U] Bas
[FONT=Impact][SIZE=3][u]Mods[/u][/SIZE][/FONT] Zekrov Terry
[U][FONT=Impact][SIZE=3]Helpers[/SIZE][/FONT][/U] Hiring
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ySeoJPA.png[/img][/CENTER]

Enflux offers its very own achievements system which allows players to complete tasks inorder to recieve a highly sought after Mbox! Mbox’s contain rares and have a even smaller chance to present you with a Ultra Rare! Some rewards included in these boxes would include,
► Custom Phats
► Custom Santas
► Custom Wings
► Death Cape

► Organized home. (seriously)
► ADDED MORE 745+ items like Drygore
► 100% Construction

► FALLING STAR STRIKES HOME
► 15+ Bosses

[CENTER][/CENTER]
Enflux offers a Wide Variety of bosses, each gives you PVM points which can be used in the either high or low level PVM shops. You can purchase things such as Drygores, chaotics, or maybe even teir 90 Armors!
Some of the bosses you would fight include,
► All GodWars Bosses (Arma, Bandos, Zammy, Sara, and Nex
► King Black Dragon
► Sunfreet
► Vorago
► YK’Lagor
► Tormented Demons
► Corperal Beast

[CENTER][/CENTER]
► 15 + Bosses to train on.
► Customised starter gear and combat levels for classes(Warrior, Mage, Archer, Skiller).
► Dominion Tower (with Dominion factor and rewards.)
► Working slayer with rewards.
► Multiple Training Teleports.
► PvM Points, rewards for killing Monsters.
► Working LootShare.
► Custom Slayer point shop

[CENTER][/CENTER]
While enflux is a heavy PVM/PVP server, Skilling is very competative. Highscores keep our community in competition with each other, and with 25 prestiges there is a lot of skilling to do!
skillers can enjoy many perks of being one. There are 200m Special “Skill Master Capes” all with their own unique particle effects. Each skill has its respective outfit to increase XP boost by up to 5%. If your feeling risky, you can even skill in the wild to earn a 1.4x EXP boost!

► Stable, customised XP rate. (Not easy, not very hard).
► Construction, Own a House, build inside it and chill with friends.
► Livid Farming + Fully working Original farming with Compost bin etc.
► New Animation options for Cooking, Mining, Smithing and Fletching.
► Custom Dungeoneering, 2 Levels done.
► Agility Tickets and rewards shop.
► Agility Reward points shop
► NEW Alching (Low/high)
► NEW Enchanting
► NEW Cooking being worked on, water, flour, pies etc.
► PuroPuro
► Runespan

► Auto-Donation System
► Highscores
► Switchitemslook (New/Old).
► Great Economy.
► Decanting.
► Money Pouch.
► Max Cape + Completionist Capes.
► Unique Home (soon to add ::sethome when player count rises).
► Dwarf Multi-cannons.
► Custom Punishment system, warnings (BlackMarks) with automatic punishments such as jail/ban.
► Party Demon summoned to rock out the home.
► Now much more dialogue, more objects at home, skill flags etc.
► 100% working Loyalty Shop
► 200M “Mastery” capes for all 25 Working Skills
► Updated Daily
► Flawless Switching
► Very Qualified Staff
► Custom Forums
► 50x EXP Rate
► Teir 90 Armor and Weapons
► Obsidian, tetsu, sea singer and death lotus
► melee/ranged/mage kiln capes
